Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* conflate_add_ping_report)(void *opaque, const char *set, const kvpair_t *pair)

Callback for conflate ping reports.

When performing a ping test, results are given back in named sets, one for each input under test.

Parameters:
opaque value given in the ping report callback
set a key indicating which of the calling sets is being reported
pair detailed information about this set's test

typedef void(* conflate_add_stat)(void *opaque, const char *k, const char *v)

Callback for conflate stats.

The key and value parameters represent the stat name and value that should be reported.

Parameters:
opaque value given in the stat callback
k a stat key (may not be NULL)
v a stat value (may not be NULL)

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum conflate_log_level

Log levels.

Enumerator:
DEBUG  Various debug messages (for example xmpp stanzas).
INFO  Info messages that might be helpful.
WARN  Warnings of stuff going bad.
ERROR  Noteworthy error conditions.
FATAL  The rapture is upon us.

Function Documentation

void init_conflate ( conflate_config_t *  conf  ) 

Initilize the given configuration to defaults.

This should be called *before* you fill in your config.

Parameters:
conf configuration to be initialized

bool start_conflate ( conflate_config_t  conf  ) 

The main entry point for starting a conflate agent.

Parameters:
conf configuration for libconflate
Returns:
true if libconflate was able to properly initialize itself
